Lodging

Taniti Resort

Taniti Resort, the only large 4-star resort on the stunning island of Taniti, offers visitors a luxurious retreat amidst breathtaking natural beauty. This expansive resort is renowned for its elegant accommodations, exceptional amenities, and prime location between the island’s verdant tropical forests and tranquil sandy beaches. Guests can enjoy a variety of world-class features, including a spa, fine dining restaurants, and an infinity pool overlooking the crystal-clear waters of the ocean. As a centerpiece of the island’s hospitality, Taniti Resort provides the perfect setting for relaxation, adventure, and an unforgettable island experience.

Taniti Lodge

Taniti Lodge provides a cozy and welcoming stay for visitors seeking comfort and charm on the island of Taniti. While not as extravagant as larger resorts, this well-kept lodge offers a tranquil retreat with warm hospitality and thoughtful amenities. Surrounded by lush greenery, Taniti Lodge features comfortable accommodations, a laid-back atmosphere, and easy access to the island’s stunning beaches and attractions. Perfect for travelers who value simplicity and affordability without compromising on quality, Taniti Lodge delivers a peaceful and enjoyable island experience.

Book Now

Taniti Hostel

Taniti Hostel is the island's most budget-friendly accommodation, offering an affordable and relaxed stay for travelers seeking adventure without breaking the bank. The hostel features simple but clean rooms, shared facilities, and a friendly communal atmosphere. Ideal for backpackers and solo travelers, Taniti Hostel provides essential comforts, including a shared kitchen, cozy lounge areas, and an outdoor space perfect for mingling with fellow guests. Located within walking distance of Taniti's beaches and local attractions, the hostel is a great base for exploring the island while keeping expenses low.
